entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RequestReJIT crashes when called from CEEInfo::reportInliningDecision #95653
  • JIT: Validate DFS tree in post-phase checks #95652
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Should the loop bit vector traits be stored as part of `FlowGraphNaturalLoop`? #95651
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Consider compressing loop bit vectors further #95649
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Running `Scenario=WasmTestOnNodeJS` does not set `ENVIRONMENT_IS_NODE` #95639
  • Implement .NET Swift interop support targeting OSX and Apple mobile #95638
    9.0.0
  • End-user scenarios for .NET Swift interop #95636
    9.0.0
  • Binding Tools for Swift integration and distribution #95633
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.PhysicalFilesWatcher.RaiseChangeEvents throws uncatchable IOException on thread pool thread #95631
  • Icorrect comment for the year pattern in DateTimeFormat #95629
    Future
  • [browser] Validate that browser template debugging works #95627
    9.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Metadata Dependency question #95626
  • Issue with Delegate Pointers in .NET Core AOT using EasyHook #95624
  • [Perf] Regressions from cross-block local assertion prop #95645
  • [Perf] Regressions from "Remove BBJ_NONE" #95646
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization on Node, Windows throws with "non-standard" format of era #95623
  • .NET 8.0 ChannelClosedException using gRPC (Http2Connection) #95621
    9.0.0
  • Path functions behaving differently on UNC device paths than implied from documentation #95619
  • Flags enum ToString breaking change in .NET 8? #95617
  • Host error_codes.h should include basic description as comments #95615
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] DWARF debug info is generated for trimmed static fields #93868
  • `BigInteger` cast to `UInt128` throws `OverflowException` even when range is sufficient #95628
  • Get \u202F(8239) instead of ' '(32) on DateTime.ToLongTimeString when the currentCulture is en-us with in mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:8.0 #95620
  • Blazor WebAssembly unrecoverable when session cookie has large number of claims #40835
    Future
  • Stack overflow in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor.CreateDelegate #57233
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests with libraries pgo and random osr stress #95600
    9.0.0
  • Split on Span and Count disfunctioning (bug) when multiple separators given #95625
  • System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Save(Stream stream) can not suppport .NET8 #95448
  • Do not run `stackLevelSetter` except for x86. #42673
    Future
  • JIT: clean up unused throw helpers #93948
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Alpine test #95663
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Bump WasmBuildTests timeout to 180min #95662
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.x
  • Fix call to RequestReJIT #95659
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Fix DateTimeFormat comments for year pattern (#95629) #95650
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Update terminology in loop cloning, and simplify a bit #95648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reverse parsed mail adresses in a single action #95647
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Reduce use of madvise DODUMP/DONTDUMP #95643
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [ios] Add optimized property to the Native AOT sample app #95640
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, os-ios, 8.0.2
  • JIT: Added `SVE_GD_2A` ARM64 encoding #95618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono][interp] Optimize ves_pinvoke_method () on wasm. #95545
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Switch `HammerServiceTest`, `BundleRename`, and `BundleLocalizedApp` to pre-built test assets. #95622
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Bump WasmBuildTests timeout to 180min #95630
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix generating debug info for static fields #95570
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not consider InUse registers for assigning to consecutive candidates #95612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [XUnitLogChecker] Fix condition that sets env variables for libraries runner scripts #95533
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [PERF] Update Perf Android jobs to use the Windows 11 Pixel Queue. #95655
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] [PERF] Update Perf Android jobs to use the Windows 11 Pixel Queue. #95657
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-staging] [PERF] Update Perf Android jobs to use the Windows 11 Pixel Queue. #95656
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Complete thread abort support for the new EH #95616
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Update Perf Android jobs to use the Windows 11 Pixel Queue. #95614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][AOT] Space in path to published project on unix #94306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Port loop cloning to the new loop representation #95326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix casing for "memoryRandomization" experiment so it matches the condition. #95644
    needs-area-label
  • Limit optSwitchConvert to TYP_INT/TYP_LONG #95608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix missing symbols for mono-aot-cross #95505
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.x
  • Fix whitespace issues to comply with code style #95602
    area-Meta
  • Fix mono-aot-cross .pdb file name #95604
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move most of the remaining Strong Name code to internal to the C++ file and remove duplicate validation #95536
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Port VN and loop hoisting to new loop representation #95589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Make isRemovableJmpCandidate less restrictive on AMD64 #95493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.2
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.16
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95271
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][jit] Fix the bblock check in the box+callvirt optimization. #95500
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #95123
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.2
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.27
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Suppress export name minification #95613
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Consuming the return type instead of an interface #95601
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Updating Sum() implementation. #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #95571
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • SslStream encryption buffer allocation improvements #95595
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Use a more performant way to get the current thread id #95609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95418
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasm in release build #95502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some outdated helpers in libraries/Common #95515
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    area-System.Runtime
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Consolidate wasi/wasm build bits #95535
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "error: relocation R_X86_64_PC32 cannot be used against symbol fmodf" when trying to build a native library for Android x64 or x86 arch using library mode. #37334

Closed

  • disabling vulnerability checking in version 8 of dotnet #37265
  • Add support for "and all transitive dependencies" to .slnf file format #37319

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Ensure we deploy all Roslyn binaries into the MSBuildWorkspace BuildHosts #37340
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37335
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for test and build commands #37233
    Servicing-approved, Area-Watch, 8.0.2
  • [Issue #35173] `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Create dummy AfterSdkPublish target Fixes #26710 #36850
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2329754 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37072
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37255
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Correct emsdk Version.Details.xml sha #37305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect app host used in build when PublishSingleFile=true #37114
    area-Single-File, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #37299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Disable Source Link in desktop WPF temp projects #37164
    Servicing-approved, Area-SourceLink, 8.0.2
  • Append command line arguments to project specified RunArguments #37285
    Servicing-approved, Area-Watch, 8.0.2
  • Don't copy MSBuild to Container outputs #37315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expressions can perform covariant conversion of ReadOnlySpan in emit #71106
  • [Bug] Only allow a single instance of VS telemetry in the language server #71101
  • [Bug] Language server extension dlls with analyzers and MEF parts get loaded twice into different ALCs #71100
  • Rich copy/paste of C# source code into Office fails in the latest Visual Studio preview #71099
    17.9
  • Could not find rule set file #71096
  • Layering violation: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.EditorFeatures.Wpf.csproj references Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.15.0 #71095
  • PreferredUILang is not accessible from Incremental Generators #71094
  • `MemberNotNull` not works for local functions #71092

Closed

  • `[ImmutableObjectAttribute(...)]` causes NullReferenceException in CSharpUseCollectionExpressionForFluentDiagnosticAnalyzer #70981
  • Roslyn emits redundant non-taken conditional branch for Nullable<T> == comparison #56875
    17.9
  • 'Use collection expressions' should not disappear if the target element type contains a mismatching tuple element name #70998
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34404.193 #71093

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and… #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Loosen compiler restriction which was not required by the spec #71110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix use-collection-expr when it breaks type inference with arrays #71105
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename automatic restore requests to be more explicit #71104
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report diagnostics for inline array types that are not valid as type arguments. #71103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Check Frame's VSFPROPID_IsDocDataInitialized before Getting DocData #71102
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove dead goto-def/peek/ctrl-click EA impls for TS. TS is now entirely on LSP for these experiences. #71098
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Disable ExtractMethod and VerifyTextSync after 17.9P1 failures #71089
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2329764 #71109
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #71108
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #71107
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #71091
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #71090
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid leaking text views on cancellation #71081
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid redundant `HasValue` call in lifted custom binary operator #70934
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged, Next
  • Still offer 'use collection expression' when tehre is a tuple name mismatch in the code. #71085
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71113
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Set order of precedence for obsoletion attribute family #71043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Upgrade versions #71087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Draft - testing out new API to get semantic model with nullability analysis disabled #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cancel the request to copilot when typing start #71055
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support organizing imports as part of LSP document formatting #70538
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add IVT from EA.Razor to MS.ANC.Razor.Test.Common.Tooling #71086
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update MSBuild ref dependency #71069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update and unskip Razor test #70855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Component Library with www styles, the stylesheets cannot be accessed asp.net app via link tag #52594
  • Browser hangs when @layout is specified in _Imports file in child folder (Blazor-WASM) #52593
  • Add a simple TooManyRequestsResult to provided action object results #52592
  • .NET 8 Blazor WebApp hangs when toggling between pages #52591
  • Build incrementalism doesn't work for JS initializers #52588
    Planning: WebUI
  • Regression: HTTP 401 When refreshing page using MS Entra ID Auth (Blazor - WASM + Server) #52586
    8.0.x
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52585
  • Blazor: Let browser handle hash change #52583
    8.0.x
  • Adding a route to a Blazor component doesn't work with hot reload #52582

Closed

  • Blazor Web App in auto mode cannot be used for website development #52587
  • blazorwasm hosted SingleOrg template is missing #52584
  • Constant loop in scaffolded Login.razor: OnInitializedAsync when using rendermode InteractiveServer at <Routes> level #52481
  • Should not UseAuthentication method check services registration same way as UseAuthorization does? #52505
  • HostFilteringMiddleware. It is returning "The host '{Host}' does not match an allowed host." time to time. #51960
    9.0-preview1
  • Cookies with a blank value are not present in IRequestCookieCollection #52590
  • After updating .NET 7 Blazor server app to .NET 8, deployment to IIS breaks app when in a folder rather than single website #52517
  • Allow Manual/Explicit Route Entries for Blazor `Router` Component #42431
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: json #52558
  • Perf regression: json #52576
  • Blazor Standalone WebAssembly with MSAL Microsoft work accounts does not return JWT (access_token) #40582
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor server DelegatingHandler for http client causing JavaScript error with prerendering disabled #40336
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WebAssembly Auth0 logout fails #40046
    Planning: WebUI
  • Add a setting in ASP.NET Core KeyVault integration package to set or not the precedence over application configuration #18822
    Backlog
  • Blazor WASM Lazy Loading with App Bundling #39935
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WASM AADB2C template fetchdata failed due to The issuer '(null)' is invalid #39401
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor server application on Ubuntu 20.04 cannot find _framework/blazor.server.js #39354
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor PWA Not Able to Install After Publishing on Azure Web Service #39195
    Planning: WebUI
  • >>NET6 Blazor WASM debugging when running in IIS #39125
    Planning: WebUI
  • Having a space in project name for a hosted Blazor WebAssembly project breaks the build #39059
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WebAssembly: make ChangeEventArgs.Value work both ways for the scope of the event handler #38520
    Planning: WebUI
  • dotnet user-secrets list --json outputs invalid json #52247
  • Allow For Inheritance with RouteAttribute #40825
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Blazor Server .NET 6 No Scroll after clicking an anchor link #40800
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Isolated css: generated attribute placement #43157
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fixed HostFilteringMiddleware. Added HostFilteringMiddleware.MiddlewareConfigurationManager #52038
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates (#52428) #52461
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 8.0.x
  • Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #52523
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • HeaderDictionaryTypeExtensions not using Dictionary #52551
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [dotnet-dump] Parallel stacks doesn't show threads which are waiting for a lock #4418
    9.0.0

Updated

  • Upgrade to .NET 9 SDK #4421
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • An additional flag to parallel stacks to include runtime stacks to pstacks command #4423

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Margin set on CoillectionView cells isn't correctly taken into account #19240
  • AzDO Android build has error with `appium-doctor` #19239
  • Don't report Debug message for comments in XAML files for internal builds #19238
  • Custom Build Configurations require explicit iOS RuntimeIdentifier values in the csproj file. Can I set these using Conditions? #19235
  • When starting a new activity that inherits from MauiAppCompatActivity throw a better exception #19233
    Backlog
  • Monitoring Content/URL Changes in WebView for Blazor WASM Pages in .NET MAUI #19232
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: 'Cannot access a closed Stream on .net 8 maui android #19230
    Backlog
  • Very bad performance in net8 compared to net7 when creating views at runtime #19229
    Backlog
  • [testing] Bots on devdiv hanging on android device tests #19228
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Entry placeholder value is clear after clear button click in MAUI UWP #19226
  • [iOS] PushModalAsync navigation doesn't navigate #19225
  • CollectionView itemtemplate layout problem (WinUI) #19221
    Backlog
  • SearchHandler Command is not executed on iOS #19219
    Backlog
  • [MAUI 8] Label measurement is wrong, TailTruncation not working #19218
  • How do i fix this? Everytime i try to run mij code in vs it gives me a error #19217
  • Issue with iOS Screen Overlay and Non-Clickable Items in .NET MAUI #19216
  • Keyboard regression bugs in .NET 8 #19214
  • [Android] ScrollOrientation.Neither not disable scroll #19213
  • Custom Picker border not working on Android #19211
  • .NET MAUI app works both in debug and release mode on android but after publishing to apk. The app crashes on physical device. #19210
  • [Windows][CollectionView]Label Disappear when set Style in ContentPage.Resources #19209
  • Fails to bind dictionary to CollectionView on WinUI #19208
  • MacCatalyst Second Window With BlazorWebView Crashes App #19207
  • Maui CollectionView ChildAdded/Removed issues #19206

Closed

  • [iOS] Wrong default left/right margin in the navigation bar on iOS #19231
  • [WinUI] The app crashes when dragging Slider thumb near the end #17974
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] CollectionVIew scrolling performance #18510
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Maui - publish as exe dulicated the files #19220
  • How to customize Default About page on MacOS? #19222
  • Appium occasionally fails to install #19036
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • A new class created in Platform/Android folder of .NET MAUI project will have wrong namespace #17148

PullRequests

Created

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Column mapping is changed, if table splitting is introduced. #32521
  • SQL Server: consider switching from COALESCE to ISNULL #32519
  • More Cosmos DB model customization options #32517

Closed

  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of Type "". #32525
  • Is there any way to check whether provider supports transactions and certain isolation levels? #32524
  • EF Core ignores compiled model with PublishAot flag setted #32496
  • How to know the table and column name that is the problem in a foreign key exception in Entity Core? #32476
  • Contains to OPENJSON translation generates invalid SQL: Sintax error near '$' #32468
  • Query root of type 'TemporalAsOfQueryRootExpression' wasn't handled by provider code. This issue happens when using a provider specific method on a different provider where it is not supported. #32428
  • Interception point that gets the returned data after serialization #32418
  • Table splitting: Support mapping to the same table/column as another entity/entity's property. #32406
  • Compex types inconsistencies?: Record struct vs record for Requrired and ComplexType attribute, how to deal with Default values? #32404
  • Update on foreign key relation on a read only scenario #32402
  • [EF Core 8] InvalidCastException when adding Entity with nullable PK: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Func`3[System.Nullable`1[System.Int32],System.Nullable`1[System.Int32],System.Boolean]' to type 'System.Func`3[System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean]'. #32387
  • Problem updating an entity in relational database #32377
  • DbFunction definition returning nullable value type causes incorrect SQL to get generated #29585
    8.0.0
  • Does EF Core support collection expressions? #32475

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Revert behavior to throw when attempting to modify an unconstrained alternate key property #32523
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Make proxies thread-safe accessing a navigation once loaded #32522
  • [release/8.0] Infer type mapping suitable for concatenating two results (#32510) #32520
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • Add DbContextOptions composibility support #32518
    breaking-change

Merged

  • Update Grpc.AspNetCore #32500
  • Revert behavior to throw when attempting to modify an unconstrained alternate key property #32492

Updated

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.59.0 #32287
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32504
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Cosmos: Generate ordinal values for key properties that used not to be persisted. #32489
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • .NET 9 Preview 1 MAUI baseline manifests need to be updated. #17897
  • Update CI to Latest OSes #17888
  • The Release Notes link is invalid on the .NET 9.0 SDK installation wizard. #17874
  • Nuget.config with multiple sources causes installation failures #17904
  • Upgrade the SDK after creating and running projects, the SDK was installed SxS not upgraded. #17907

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #17917

Merged

  • Enable open ssl sha 1 signatures for CentOS Stream 9 #17889
  • Update referenced SDK version for source build #17909
  • License scan result updates #17916
  • Remove unused version in Versions.props #17914
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.SourceBuild.SmokeTests.csproj #17913
  • Delete target for SourceLink packages #17912
  • Use Directory.Build.props only #17910
  • Delete unused placeholder files #17911

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17806
